pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, December 3, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

London, United Kingdom

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Latvia, Egils Levits.

Sir Wilfrid Laurier Room, third floor
Canada House
Trafalgar Square

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with His Royal Highness The Prince of Wales.

Drawing Room, first floor
Clarence House

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a discussion with the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte, as part of the NATO Engages: Innovating the Alliance conference.

Great Hall, third floor
Central Hall Westminster

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the United States, Donald Trump.

Official residence of the United States Ambassador
Winfield House

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at Buckingham Palace.

Grand Entrance
Buckingham Palace

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage and host photographer only

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception given by Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II, Queen of Canada.

Buckingham Palace

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage and host photographer only

6:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in the Leaders Family Photo.

Throne Room, first floor
Buckingham Palace

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage and host photographer only

7:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at 10 Downing Street.   

10 Downing Street 

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of the arrival

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a dinner given by the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

10 Downing Street 

Note for media:

  • Host photographer only
